PIVMat Function Reference<< Prev |        
zerotonanfield
Converts 0 elements to NaNs in fields

Description 
CF = zerotonanfield(F) converts all the 0 elements of the vector/scalar 
field array F into NaNs.
See Also 
nantozerofield, interpf. 
 
Published output in the Help browser 
   showdemo zerotonanfield
